title: 3 shows to make you laugh this Tuesday
text:
Cape Town – Sit back, relax, and have a chuckle this Tuesday night.

From hidden camera-practical jokes, singles going on blind dates that can either go good or bad and a 1950s housewife who becomes a stand-up comic.

Here are our 3 shows to tune into tonight.

Impractical Jokers

21:00 - Comedy Central (DStv 122)

This hidden camera-practical joke series that follows four members of the comedy troupe The Tenderloins as they coerce one another into doing public pranks while being filmed by hidden cameras.

First Dates UK

22:02 - BBC Lifestyle (DStv 174)

A dating show with a twist. Each episode documents several couples having dinner in a unique restaurant in which everyone is on a first date. In this episode self-proclaimed ladies' man Jayden gets mitten with Isabel, 44-year-old Sarah has a date with John, and eternal romantic Tim returns to the restaurant.

The Marvelous Mrs Maisel

Amazon Prime Video

It's the late 1950s, and Miriam "Midge" Maisel has everything she has ever wanted - the perfect husband, two kids and an elegant apartment on New York's Upper West Side. Her seemingly idyllic life takes a surprising turn when she discovers a hidden talent she didn't previously know she had - stand-up comedy.

Compiled by Leandra Engelbrecht
description: Sit back, relax, and have a chuckle - from hidden camera-practical jokes to a 1950s housewife who becomes a stand-up comic.
